outputs.output_descr:
Governance, accountability and transparency enhanced in the public sector
Capacity of Public administration developed through the adoption of modern techniques and tools.
Human resources management modernised and developed
Public services efficiency enhanced and the administration/citizens relationship improved
Enhancing the use of ICT tools and establish an E-Government portal
Introducing change management techniques and promote OMSAR reform programs 
Technical and Administrative support provided to ensure the proper execution of awarded contract with the scope of the following specialized projects: Solid Waste, AFKAR and LOGO.

project_title: Support to Civil Service Reform and Management Capacity
